relations.sentence: Two friends spent a summer afternoon skeet shooting in Pennsylvania.

Montrose is a quiet rural area in the northeastern corner of Pennsylvania it's a small close knit community with stately homes one traffic light in the courthouse that dominates the town square in nineteen seventy six Montrose was home to thirty year old Martin Dillon his wife and their two young children ninety dealing with very popular man in town and his father was the local mayor I mean everybody knew him and and really liked them on June second nineteen seventy six Martin Dillon left work early to go skeet shooting at his family's hunting camp a secluded place called gun smoke is good friend Dr Stephen Scherer went along Stephen sure was one of the town's doctors and a close personal friend of the Dylan's.
